artical.contain: Animal Abuse Documented At Multiple Markets In San Francisco
artical.des: We recently conducted an investigation into live animal markets in the Bay Area, finding welfare violations at 11 shops that sold and slaughtered live animals. We documented frogs piled on top of each other and chickens stuffed into metal cages. More from Plant Based News:

artical.contain: Undercover Investigation At Live Markets In Bay Area Reveals Hidden Abuse And Cruelty
artical.des: Right across the San Francisco Bay Area are dozens of live markets where animals are sold live or slaughtered and sold right to customers. Our undercover investigators visited 18 live markers in San Francisco, San Jose, and Oakland and were shocked by what they saw. Read more from One Green Planet:..

directory.name: AENON The Health Kitchen
directory.des: AENON Health Kitchen, a hygienic restaurant that provides simple, palatable, wholesome & healthy food at affordable prices. We are dedicated in offering an extraordinary dining experience and providing consumers the opportunity to learn on healthy lifestyle. Health is a choice, not a chance!
directory.add: 1, Jalan 4/93, Taman Miharja, Jalan Cheras, 55200 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan

directory.name: Eco Life Kitchen
directory.des: We serve delicious home-cooked vegetarian meals, crafted with the healthiest ingredients and plenty of love. We also sell natural, handmade clay and wooden Buddhist crafts, health supplements, and homemade beauty products.
